name: A silver torc fitted with a twinkling stone
data: It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
